metadata.description: the Location in which your OMS will be provisioned

metadata.Description: List of recipients for the email alert separated by semicolon

metadata.description: The name of the action group to be associated with the alerts actions

resources.name: [concat(parameters('omsWorkspaceName'), '/oqygl')]

properties.query: [concat('let resourceName = "',parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd','";let metricName ="Http5xx";let resourceProvider ="MICROSOFT.WEB";let resourceIdContains ="/SITES/";AzureMetrics | where ResourceProvider== resourceProvider and ResourceId contains resourceIdContains and MetricName== metricName and Resource == toupper(resourceName)  | top 15 by TimeGenerated| summarize  AggregatedValue = sum(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated, 24h)')]
properties.displayName: [concat(parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd',' WebApp returning high rate of 5xx errors')]

resources.name: [concat(parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd',' WebApp returning high rate of 5xx errors')]

properties.description: [concat('Check ',parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd',' WebApp: High rate of Http Requests returning 5xx error')]
